entry.title: Combined summary - Question about dust spam rule
entry.summary: The given context is a code block with a comment that states the restriction of dust spam by requiring a minimum transaction fee (nMinFee) or minimum relay transaction fee (nMinRelayTxFee) if any output is less than 0.01. The purpose of this code is to prevent low-value outputs from clogging up the network with excess data, which would slow down blockchain processing times. The use of these fees acts as a deterrent for spammers and encourages the creation of more valuable transactions. It is important to note that the exact values of nMinFee and nMinRelayTxFee may vary depending on the specific implementation of the blockchain technology being used.
